CustomField.description: The field is populated when the value of the 'Data Review' picklist field starts with 'Completed'. This field is only set once when it is empty.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The field is populated when the value of the 'Data Review' picklist field starts with 'Completed'. This field is only set once when it is empty.
CustomField.label: Sales Triggers Notifications Completed
